description: A Flutter application main source file that sets up the app's main widget, theme, and home page with a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the Flutter app that sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget serving as the main page with a title and layout.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the UI with app bar and centered progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application that runs the MyApp widget.
